attributes.action: Stop the alteration of the Regimental uniforms of the Guards Division
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The adultaration of the uniform of the household division the pride that the Regiments feel for their turnout and pride in their respective Regiments will be lost forever the years of history being lost by the penny pinching By the MOD is an utter disgrace this we do in the names of the men who made the ultimate sacrifice for this Country

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
